Articles.Content:
Hi,

how di i read/edit the persistent.sfs in order to find out, which Kerman died during my duty and maybe reanimate them?

Cheers.

Make a backup of your file first Gunhed

Then open it on notepad, and find the Kerbals State value, it'll be 0 for ready, 1 for assigned, 2 I forgot and 3 is toast.

Change it to 0 and they should pop up on the next launch, or find the Crew value of your crafts pod, and change the number there to the number of the Kerbal you want

That was quick!

Many thanks exactly the information I was looking for (wave hands)

Had to summon undead Jebediah, his work was not complete yet...

Edited September 25, 2012 by Gunhed
